description: This file defines a Knockout.js ViewModel for a Todo application, managing todos including add, remove, edit, and persistence to local storage.

classes.name: ViewModel
classes.description: Main view model managing todo list operations and state.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new todo item based on current input.

methods.name: editItem
methods.description: Enables editing mode for a todo item.

methods.name: stopEditing
methods.description: Stops editing, updates title, or removes item if empty.

methods.name: cancelEditing
methods.description: Cancels editing and reverts to previous title.
